description: PIMS 2967: CC EA: PNG Second National Communication

subproject.corporate outcome: Development plans and programmes integrate environmentally sustainable solutions in a manner that promotes poverty reduction, MDG achievement and low-emission climate-resilient development
subproject.description: The purpose of this Climate Change enabling activity is to conduct a through needs assessment and analysis of the critical areas for UNFCCC implementation in PNG. The project will fund a self-assessment of climate change realted activities that are either cpmleted or under preparation that are relevant to the formulation of the Second Climate Change National Communication Report. The main objective is to undertake a highly consultative and participatory process of needs assessment to identify and validate the critical priorities for further in-dept studies during the preparation of the Second National Communication
subproject.title: PIMS 2967: CC EA: PNG SNC
